channel.title: Asian Fusion on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Asian Fusion on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Hinoki and the Bird
item.description: Hinoki and the Bird has been featured on a lot of lists. I thought this place would be similar to The Hart + The Hunter, but I was pleasantly surprised. Like many new cuisines that have opened, this is yet another one of those Asian inspired fusions. But unlike many that I’ve been to, I put this pretty high on my list for taste, decor, and decent prices. This is #15 of 52 on my 2014 LA food expedition.
